This dataset is associated with the following publication:
Schaider, L., S. Balan, A. Blum, D. Andrews, M. Strynar, M. Dickinson, D. Lunderberg, J. Lang, and G. Peaslee. Fluorinated Compounds in U.S. Fast Food Packaging.   Environmental Science & Technology Letters. American Chemical Society, Washington, DC, USA, 4(3): 105–111, (2017).
